column6: THE BURNT OFFERING PART 4 Cable vs. the Silver Surfer -- and guess who determines the winner? Deadpool holds the key to saving the world...or saving Cable's life...which choice will he make?
column8: | inker:Udon Comics | colorist:Gotham Entertainment Group | writer:Fabian Nicieza | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller (cover):Patrick Zircher
